entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as standing on the spiral staircase with Harry and Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is having a conversation with Dumbledore about his options.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is mentioned as standing on the spiral staircase with Dumbledore and Malfoy.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Malfoy's first name, used by Dumbledore in their conversation.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Malfoy are having a conversation about Malfoy's options.
Harry is standing on the spiral staircase with Dumbledore.
Malfoy's first name is Draco, used by Dumbledore in their conversation.
Harry is a witness to the conversation between Malfoy and Dumbledore.
Malfoy stepped over the body, indicating that he was involved in the fight leading to someone's death.
Dumbledore mentions that there is little time, implying that someone's death is imminent.
